metadata.title: CVE-2017-7557 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
dnsdist version 1.1.0 is vulnerable to a flaw in authentication mechanismfor REST API potentially allowing CSRF attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7557` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsdist - 1.2.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dnsdist package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1').
